CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In addition , both PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO display prominent vibronic shoulders at shorter wavelengths , implying an ordered arrangement in their solid films , with strong π-π stacking between the polymeric backbonesa feature that also appears in the spectra of regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) , which is beneficial to improve the charge mobility of resulting films.

| PzNDTDTBO |

Explanation:

* "In addition" and "implying" do not refer to material properties.
* "Both PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO" refers to two specific materials, not properties.
* "Which is beneficial to improve the charge mobility of resulting films" is a sentence fragment that does not refer to a property.
